video_prompt: A lone figure slowly turns from a futuristic cityscape, their silhouette shifting against the glowing, intricately lit structures that pulse with orange and yellow light. Distant city lights shimmer and diffuse as atmospheric haze drifts across the vast urban expanse.
image_prompt: A lone figure surveys a vast, dark, futuristic cityscape from a high vantage point. Colossal, metal skyscrapers with intricate, glowing orange and yellow cylindrical sections and vertical light lines dominate the scene under a gloomy, overcast sky, evoking a sense of awe and solitude in an advanced, perhaps dystopian, world.
refined_video_prompt: A lone figure slowly pivots, their silhouette subtly shifting. The surrounding futuristic structures subtly pulse with dynamic orange and yellow light. Distant city lights shimmer, gently diffusing as atmospheric haze softly drifts across the vast urban panorama.
